system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision pixmapable. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "pixmap, bitmap, icon, graphic, image" date: "$Date: 2013-05-30 14:33:11 -0700 (Thu, 30 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92653 $"
deferred class ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Initialization
f_pixmapable_imp_initialize../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmapable_imp_initializepixmapable_imp_initialize -- Create a GtkHBox to hold a GtkPixmap. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_hbox_newgtk_hbox_new (False, 0) end
feature -- Access
f_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmappixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap shown in Current do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap as l_internal_pixmap then Result := l_internal_pixmap.../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.Falsetwin end end
feature -- Element change
f_set_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_set_pixmapset_pixmap (a_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP) -- Assign a_pixmap to ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmappixmap. local l_internal_pixmap: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap do l_internal_pixmap ?= a_pixmap.Falsetwin.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_implementationimplementation check l_internal_pixmap /= Void then end ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap := l_internal_pixmap ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_set_pixmapinternal_set_pixmap (l_internal_pixmap, l_internal_pixmap.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_widthwidth, l_internal_pixmap.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_heightheight) end
f_remove_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_remove_pixmapremove_pixmap -- Assign Void to ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmappixmap. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap := Void ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_remove_pixmapinternal_remove_pixmap {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_hidegtk_widget_hide (../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box) end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_internal_set_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_set_pixmapinternal_set_pixmap (a_pixmap_imp: ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAP_IMP; a_width, a_height: FalseINTEGER_32) local gtk_pix_wid: FalsePOINTER l_internal_pixmap: like ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap do ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_remove_pixmapinternal_remove_pixmap l_internal_pixmap ?= ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap check l_internal_pixmap /= Void then end if a_width /= l_internal_pixmap.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_widthwidth or else a_height /= l_internal_pixmap.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_heightheight then a_pixmap_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_stretchstretch (a_width, a_height) end gtk_pix_wid := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_pixmap_newgtk_pixmap_new (a_pixmap_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_drawabledrawable, a_pixmap_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xml#f_maskmask) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_showgtk_widget_show (gtk_pix_wid) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_addgtk_container_add (../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box, gtk_pix_wid) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_widget_showgtk_widget_show (../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box) end
f_internal_remove_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_remove_pixmapinternal_remove_pixmap -- Remove pixmap from Current local p: FalsePOINTER do p := ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_gtk_pixmapgtk_pixmap if p /= Falsedefault_pointer then {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_removegtk_container_remove (../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box, p) end end
f_internal_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmap_imp.xmlEV_PIXMAP_IMP -- Internal stored pixmap.
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_gtk_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_gtk_pixmapgtk_pixmap: FalsePOINTER -- Pointer to the GtkPixmap widget. local a_child_list, l_null: FalsePOINTER do a_child_list := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_container_childrengtk_container_children (../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box) if a_child_list /= l_null then Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_g_list_nth_datag_list_nth_data (a_child_list, 0) {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_g_list_freeg_list_free (a_child_list) end end
f_pixmap_box../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_pixmap_boxpixmap_box: FalsePOINTER -- GtkHBox to hold the GtkPixmap.
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_pixmapable_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE note option: stable attribute end
